word_mean: 再构成，再组成：再生的一个类型，其时新的器官是由组织重新排列所形成，而非来自损伤面的新结构
恢复：先前因储存而有形式改变的物质恢复原来的形式，例如干藏的血清或血浆恢复为液状

sentence.Network_en: The report recommended suspension and reconstitution of the district party under redrafted rules.
sentence.Network_cn: 报告建议按新起草的规章暂时中断地区政党的活动并对其进行改组。

sentence.Network_en: The main source for family reconstitution is the parish register.
sentence.Network_cn: 重新构画家庭的主要资料来源是教区的记事录.

sentence.Network_en: Membrane reconstitution experiments have had limited success.
sentence.Network_cn: 膜的重建实验曾获得有限的成果.

复原乳_百度百科 ... 3.1生乳 raw milk 3.2复原乳 reconstituted milk 3.3巴氏杀菌 pasteurilization.
“再造奶”(reconstituted milk) 指将奶类的成分，即奶脂及从奶类衍生的其他固体(不包括其他物质)，再与水混合而成的产品，并包括冰冻.
recombination 重组合，基因重组reconstitution cell 重组细胞recrudescence 再燃

entry.tran: 重新组建，重新构建，改组（组织或国家）
entry.def: If an organization or state is reconstituted, it is formed again in a different way.

example.ex: Slowly Jewish communities were reconstituted and Jewish life began anew.
example.tran: 渐渐地，犹太社区得到重建，犹太人的生活重新开始。

example.ex: ...the reconstituted Communist Party, now called the Party of Democratic Socialism.
example.tran: 共产党改组后，现称民主社会党

entry.def: To reconstitute dried food means to add water to it so that it can be eaten.

example.ex: To reconstitute dried tomatoes, simmer in plain water until they are tender...
example.tran: 要泡开西红柿干，需要将其放在清水中用文火炖，直到它们变软。

example.ex: Try eating reconstituted dried prunes, figs or apricots.
example.tran: 试着吃些用水泡过的西梅干、无花果干或杏干。
